competitors.name: Snowflake
competitors.notes: Cloud-native data warehouse, IPO'd September 2020 at $33B valuation

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Autonomous Data Warehouse and traditional database

context: In 2020, Teradata faced disruption from cloud-native competitors, particularly Snowflake which IPO'd in September 2020 with historic valuation. The pandemic accelerated cloud data warehouse adoption. Teradata responded with Vantage, its cloud-enabled analytics platform available on AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. Competition shifted from on-premises to multi-cloud deployment models. The data lakehouse concept from Databricks represented new architectural competition.
